---
title: "Life Expectancy and Population"
---

This page explores the relationship between life expectancy and population across countries.

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gap = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")

plt.figure(figsize=(9, 6))
plt.scatter(gap["population_millions"], gap["life_expectancy"], alpha=0.6)
plt.xscale("log")
plt.xlabel("Population (millions, log scale)")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy (years)")
plt.title("Life Expectancy vs Population")
plt.show()
